Refurbish Pneumatically Driven Paint Booth

This project involved refurbishing a legacy paint booth with full pneumatical control and sequencing. Minimal documentation existed so a pneumatic schematic was generated and the system was debugged to identify failure points and restore it to production-ready operation. Basic operating and setup instructions were generated to support customer maintenance personnel.

Mitech Systems, Ltd.

Mechanical Engineering/Machine Design

Sunbury, Ohio
